samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: The sample demonstrates that default functionalities of the Accordion component (also known as collapsible panel) which works by expand and collapse action.

samples.name: Ajax Content
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to load the content to the Accordion component from external sources such as a file or website or element using Ajax library.

samples.name: Icons
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to represent pane headers with an icon in Accordion component which populates from items collection.
